settings.emailAddressesDesc: Auto-detect email addresses and make them clickable (opens email app)

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using NPD, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.licenseDesc: Permission is granted to temporarily use NPD for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
terms.userDataDesc: All notes and data are stored locally on your device. You are responsible for backing up your data regularly.
terms.disclaimerDesc: The app is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free or uninterrupted.
terms.limitationsDesc: In no event shall NPD or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the app.
terms.modificationsDesc: We may revise these terms at any time without notice. By using this app, you agree to be bound by the current version of these terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.infoCollectDesc: NPD stores all your notes and data locally on your device. We do not collect, transmit, or store any personal information on external servers.
privacy.localStorageDesc: Your notes, folders, and settings are stored using your device's local storage. This data remains on your device and is not accessible to us.
privacy.dataSecurityDesc: Since all data is stored locally, the security of your information depends on your device's security measures. We recommend using device encryption and strong passwords.
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We do not use any third-party analytics or tracking services. Your data is completely private and stays on your device.
privacy.dataBackupDesc: You can backup your data using the backup feature. Backup files are stored on your device and you control where they are kept.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

help.title: Help & Feedback
help.gettingStartedDesc: Create your first note by tapping the "+" button on the home screen. Choose from various note types including sticky notes, lined notes, Cornell notes, and more.
help.organizingDesc: Use folders to organize your notes. Long-press on a note to move it to a different folder or pin it to the top.
help.backupRestoreDesc: Regularly backup your data using the "Back up data" option. Keep your backup files in a safe location like cloud storage.
help.issueNotSaving: Notes not saving? Check your device storage space.
help.issueSlow: App running slow? Try clearing old notes or creating a backup and reinstalling.
help.issueLostData: Lost data? Restore from your latest backup file.
help.contactSupportDesc: For additional help or to report issues, please contact us through the app store review section or reach out via our support channels.
help.feedbackDesc: We value your feedback! Let us know how we can improve NPD by rating the app and leaving a review.

toasts.shareNotAvailable: Share feature not available on this device
